page.shortlink: api extension namespace uriparse class build uri method
page.example: dim uri as extension::URIParse uri.scheme = "https" uri.host = "www.mysite.com" uri.path = "/projectpath/index.html" uri.query = "firstname=john&lastname=public" ? uri.BuildURI() = "https://www.mysite.com/projectpath/index.html?firstname=john&lastname=public"
